title: "LA CITY" Logo
content:
Hi everybody !  
Could you help me to find what is the font(s) used in this “wonderful” logo ?  
Maybe it’s 2 differents fonts, no ?

Thank you so much

Best regards

Emmanuel

author: lepetitfakir

comments.content:
That’s it !  
Thank you very much Jan
Interesting logo...LA on a fault line?
